subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Jeff Adrien scored 21 points, Hasheem Thabeet had 20 and second-ranked Connecticut remained unbeaten against undersized Fairfield in a 75-55 victory.
snippet: Jeff Adrien scored 21 points, Hasheem Thabeet had 20 and second-ranked Connecticut remained unbeaten against undersized Fairfield in a 75-55 victory.
